mono.title: Mono Collection
mono.description: Mono Collection brings pure minimalism through tables crafted from the big format tiles. Simple lines and calming textures create a piece that fits effortlessly into any space, while the hand-finished details add warmth and authenticity.
mono.whyMonoDescription: Designed for modular livingâ€”pair two together for a layered coffee table moment or let a single piece anchor an entryway. Neutral palettes keep the focus on texture and proportion.

material.title: Material
material.description: Hand-poured composite with marble fragments for a mineral feel that stays cool to the touch.

finish.title: Finish
finish.description: Soft radius edges with a low-sheen sealant that resists stains without muting the speckled detail.

care.title: Care
care.description: Wipe with a damp cloth, spot clean with neutral soap. No special kits, no fussy upkeep.
